1.title: Hello_World
1.plot: Luke Atherton is a 25-year-old aspiring entrepreneur who never had the cash to follow his dream of owning his own business. Will a surprise $2400 inheritance change his life or just make for a wild weekend with friends Wayne and Devin?

2.title: A Honey of an 'O'
2.plot: Catching up with our 'H.E.R.O'es after a Summer spent, well... not doing much. You'll see what I mean.

3.title: Herding Cats
3.plot: Who the 'H' is Catrina Loren? And why is Devin all dolled up? What's up with Leisa and Catrina? The answers are not as important as the questions.. or something like that. Enjoy!

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Catrina Loren's first day on the job with Luke and his boys in H.E.R.O. Can she actually get anything done with these clowns hanging around? I wouldn't count on it... But she does learn a few things about Tolkien's linguistic etymology and pronunciation.

5.title: A Tiny Banquet
5.plot: The crew of H.E.R.O get work.. finally.. at their very first job! And what a job it is- modeling for a Prom Fashion Show. Hi-jinx will undoubtedly ensue...

imdb.plot outline: Luke Atherton and "good" friends Wayne and Devin have started a business.. but nobody seems to do much business at first. When things start to pick up and long-lost friends and lovers come crawling back, how will the group react? And who the hell is Viktor Lothaire and why did he vandalize Luke's sign?? Some questions may never be answered... (but these will.)
imdb.title: Unlikely H.E.R.O
plot: The ongoing saga of a couple of dorks trying to take over the world, one temp job at a time.

Luke Atherton and "good" friends Wayne and Devin have started a business.. but nobody seems to do much business at first. When things start to pick up and long-lost friends and lovers come crawling back, how will the group react? And who the hell is Viktor Lothaire and why did he vandalize Luke's sign?? Some questions may never be answered... (but these will.)
